sentence.Network_en: I was again using the cold, unflinching eye of the camera to probe a sick society.
sentence.Network_cn: 我再次通过照相机冷漠、坚定的镜头去探究这个病态的社会。

sentence.Network_en: The ancient people who was successful, not only had exceptional talent but also had unflinching will.
sentence.Network_cn: 古人立大事者, 不惟有超世之才,亦必有望忍不拔之志.

sentence.Network_en: British justice of the time was grim and unflinching.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国当时的法律是严酷的.

entry.def: You can use unflinching in expressions such as unflinching honesty and unflinching support to indicate that a good quality which someone has is strong and steady, and never weakens.

example.ex: ...the armed forces, all of whom had pledged their unflinching support and loyalty to the government.
example.tran: 武装力量一致保证坚决支持并效忠政府
